scripts.setup:certs: node -e "console.log('Certificates are already set up! Run: npm run dev:https')"
scripts.check:certs: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const exists = fs.existsSync('./certs/localhost.pem') && fs.existsSync('./certs/localhost-key.pem'); console.log(exists ? '✅ SSL certificates found' : '❌ SSL certificates not found');"
scripts.cap:build: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync
scripts.android:dev: npm run cap:build && npx cap run android --livereload
scripts.android:build: npm run cap:build && npx cap run android --prod
scripts.android:release: npm run cap:build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.ios:dev: npm run cap:build && npx cap run ios --livereload
scripts.ios:build: npm run cap:build && npx cap run ios --prod
scripts.ios:release: npm run cap:build && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -archivePath ./build/App.xcarchive
scripts.mobile:setup: npx cap add android && npx cap add ios && npm run cap:sync
